text: @BCGovNews @DrVictoriaLeeFH #alcoholawareness For our mental and physical health, and wellbeing BC Canada, at all times, including #COVID19, 'Avoid Alcohol" and avoid bars,pubs,nightclubs which are perfect environments as super spreaders of the corona virus! We are in this together!
